column5: message

Merge pull request #99 from maxloginov/master

Added some new refresh() logic
Prettier CS (same funttionality and same compiled JS)

Fixed a bug with CSS .chardinjs-helper-layer.chardinjs-left positioning (wrong 'margin-left: -10px'). Should be 'padding-left: 10px' instead, similarly to other classes (.chardinjs-left, .chardinjs-bottom, .chardinjs-top)

Fixed deinitialization bug in stop() method. DOM was not properly deinitialized on stop() (data values `helper_layer` and `tooltip_layer` were left unreset, so, they kept references to previously created helper elements). Added cycle resetting `helper_layer` and `tooltip_layer` data to null in stop() method.
Fixed a typo

Fixed the incorrect behavior for the refresh() method (it made its runs through visible elements only). The correct behavior is to run through all elements (invisible elements too), so that all instructions tooltips could be refreshed to reflect visibility of the underlying elements (tooltips should disappear, when their underlying elements become invisible).
Updated _position_helper_layer(element) method so that it is able now to change tooltips' visibility depending on visibility of their underlying elements, and create tooltips for new elements added to DOM after the instructions layer has been displayed.
